welcome_feed.welcome_feed_description: We’re delighted that you’re here to take the first steps towards your child’s reading readiness with Square Panda’s Playground!
welcome_feed.welcome_feed_details_first: This is your destination to view the footprints of your child’s newly earned badges and discover more skills that they're ready to learn.
welcome_feed.welcome_feed_details_second: It’s easy to follow your child’s progress with a quick glance at their collection of earned badges. These badges symbolize the top skills your child needs to become reading ready from letter identification to rhymes to blended letter sounds! To help your child practice, you can view lists of all the letters and words they’ve learned.
welcome_feed.welcome_feed_details_third: Imagine how thrilled your child will be when she or he discovers the word “Mom” and your photo appears on screen while they’re playing! By adding new words and familiar pictures to your child’s word bank, you'll be able to customize any word imaginable - pets, family members, school logos and even special spelling lists. Just check out the My Curriculum area to create personalized word lists.
welcome_feed.welcome_feed_details_fourth: Well we have kept you long enough - it's time to jump into the Playground!

player.add_modalbody: You already have the maximum number of players added.

player.no_players: You don't have any players added.Start adding now.
player.no_graph_description: Your child hasn't played any words in this badge. Check out the description above to see the words covered in this badge and start playing the words to view your child performance graph.

messages.delete_player_body1: Deleting this player will wipe curriculum advancement and game progress across all games, and will not be recoverable.
messages.delete_player_body2: If you would like more info about our privacy policies...

badges.no_spendtime: You haven't spent anytime on games.

badges.noword_correct: No words are marked as correct so far.

description.text: Add any word you like into your own personalized Square Panda word bank! In addition to over 4,000 words in our database, be sure your child's very own special words are included in their games! Some ideas are:
description.upload_mom_dad_pic: or upload your own picture to MOM or DAD
description.milestone_text: At Square Panda, parents and teachers rule! Not all parents and teachers want the same things, share the same beliefs, or think the same way. So, we've left it up to you! It'scompletely within your control as to what words your children can and cannot see. Take a look at our lists of curated 'bathroom words' and more advanced science 'anatomy' words.You can turn these entire word lists on and off, or you can look at individual words on the list and decide if you want them excluded from your child's game. Customize away!
description.milestone_text_note: Square Panda will never intentionally display a bad word to your child. However, as your child explores letter combinations, he/she may inadvertently discover a mature word. Here you have the flexibility to allow or disallow these words from your child's game.

curriculum.customword_modalbody: You already have the maximum number of custom words added.

message.word_notexist_want_procced: It’s a new word, do you like to proceed?

lost_letters.data: Lost a letter? Let us know here and we'll exclude these letters from your games!

notifications.data: Stay up to date on your child's latest accomplishments, learn new reading readiness tips, and be the first to know about new releases of Square Panda learning apps! Tap on any of the activity notifications to receive email updates.
notifications.player_updates_data: As your child discovers new skills and earns badges you'll receive a realtime update of their activity and progress.
notifications.panda_news_data: Be the first to know about the newest Square Panda learning apps (and get special offers too!)
notifications.educational_feeds_data: Amplify learning with reading readiness tips and the latest research, articles and videos to help your child be reading ready!
